meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Roger Craig Scott Wells Meg Miller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5976.

div.div:
Roger Craig game 1.
First game of Season 27.

td.p: Roger Craig, a graduate student of computer science from Newark, Delaware
Scott Wells, a medievalist from Los Angeles, California
Meg Miller, a high school Latin teacher from Milton, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $29,299)

tr.td: AN OCEAN OF KNOWLEDGE
THE WORLD SERIES MVP's TEAM
(Alex: You identify the team for us.)
GOVERNMENT BY COMMITTEE
FOOD & DRINK
THE ONION DESCRIBES THE STATE
FEELS LIKE "FALL"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'These, like the spring type, are caused by the gravitational pull of the sun & the moon on the ocean')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: These, like the spring type, are caused by the gravitational pull of the sun & the moon on the ocean

Scott

tr.td: Meg
Scott
Roger
BILL CLINTON & THE CLINTON FOUNDATION
(Alex: and the ex-President will deliver all the clues in that category.)
MOVIE DIRECTORS
THE THINGS YOU SAY!
ELEMENTAL CLUES
GHOST WRITERS
IN THE SKY
